about_the_game:
Here comes the dynamite with the all-new Crime Boss: Rockay City – Cracker Character Pack!

Unlock Commando Cracker and take advantage of his overwhelming firepower. As a former soldier, Cracker is both proficient with firearms and close quarters combat.

Unique Loadout

  • Primary Weapon: STGW 51.

  • Secondary Weapon: Micro SMG Gal.

  • Melee Weapon: Tactical Tomahawk.

  • 2 Unique perks including SAS Instincts Perk and Close Combat. Reveal enemies and objects whilst aiming and become the ultimate mercenary by regaining health with your melee kills.

  • RPG-7 Equipment – up the ante with this one shot RPG weapon.

  • Base health is higher for Commando Cracker than the base version of Cracker.

Base version of Cracker will be unlocked with this DLC if the character has not already been unlocked as part of the progression system.

All versions of Cracker will be playable in both Single-Player and Multiplayer game modes.
detailed_description:
Here comes the dynamite with the all-new Crime Boss: Rockay City – Cracker Character Pack!

Unlock Commando Cracker and take advantage of his overwhelming firepower. As a former soldier, Cracker is both proficient with firearms and close quarters combat.

Unique Loadout

  • Primary Weapon: STGW 51.

  • Secondary Weapon: Micro SMG Gal.

  • Melee Weapon: Tactical Tomahawk.

  • 2 Unique perks including SAS Instincts Perk and Close Combat. Reveal enemies and objects whilst aiming and become the ultimate mercenary by regaining health with your melee kills.

  • RPG-7 Equipment – up the ante with this one shot RPG weapon.

  • Base health is higher for Commando Cracker than the base version of Cracker.

Base version of Cracker will be unlocked with this DLC if the character has not already been unlocked as part of the progression system.

All versions of Cracker will be playable in both Single-Player and Multiplayer game modes.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790 or AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650, 4 GB or AMD Radeon RX 570, 4 GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 90 GB available space
  • Sound Card: On board
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-10600K or AMD Ryzen 5 3600XT
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070, 8 GB, AMD Radeon RX Vega 56, 8 GB, or Intel Arc A770, 16 GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 90 GB available space
  • Sound Card: On Board
